cast.overview: Two sisters return home after a stay in a mental institution, only to face disturbing events and a strained relationship with their stepmother. As eerie occurrences unfold, dark family secrets begin to surface, blurring the line between reality and nightmare.
cast.title: A Tale of Two Sisters

details.biography:
Yum Jung-ah (염정아) is a South Korean actress. She was born on July 28, 1972. Her notable films include A Tale of Two Sisters, The Big Swindle, The Old Garden, and Cart, as well as the television series Royal Family. She is best known for her role of Han Seo Jin in the jTBC drama "SKY Castle".

She was also the first runner-up in the 1991 Miss Korea Beauty Pageant.
details.name: Yum Jung-ah
